item.title: Strat's Surmount Speedrun Guide
item.description: Links Pathing Tutorial skip / Speedrun mode Zone 3 - Route 1 - Camera Omar Skip Zone 4 - Route 1 - Rocks on Omar Skip Tricks Juan Arm Climb Juan Hop Item Tier List Equipment Tier List Mushroom Tier List Terminology Links ¶ Speedrun.com Surmount Page Pathing ¶ Tutorial skip / Speedrun mode ¶ Saves: ~10min Difficulty: Easy Secret path that skips the tutorial and decreases the number of cutscenes you need to button through.
